attributes.action: Speed bumps and speed camera on Quinta drive Barnet gets
attributes.additional_details: To prevent accidents and to save lives as they drive down Quinta like it’s a race coarse 3 accidents have happend in the last 3 weeks alone
attributes.background:
To save and prevent accidents on Quinta drive Barnet 
As accidents keep happening and before it becomes fatal let’s save these accidents the best we can with speed bumps or speed cameras

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about local roads are a matter for your local authority, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
